title: I've seen this before, but what's it called?
author: 11624bill

comments.content: Can't find an exact match. [Arius Dual](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701132031/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfprimegraphics/arius/dual) may work for you.

Thanks for that, but it's not near enough.  
I may need to reproduce it as an image file.

> I may need to reproduce it as an image file.

As it's only a 3-letters job, you may consider to retrace it. Should not take too much time...
